items.headline: This secret ingredient of the economy says things are OK — and no recession is brewing
items.summary_en: When the economy shows sign of stress, one of the first things Americans strike from their budgets are frequent takeout dinners and restaurant reservations. It’s one of the best early warning signs of recession.

items.headline: Why EVs are still so expensive that they’re driving up the cost of all new cars
items.summary_en: Drivers still largely pay a premium for electric vehicles, in part because they’re still costly for most companies to make.

items.headline: Small caps are having a good year — but here’s why the S&P 500 will win in the end
items.summary_en: After years of being the market’s forgotten children, small-cap stocks are back in the spotlight in 2025. But are they catching up to their older, richer S&P 500 siblings? Not a chance.
